member.name: NMTBDISPINFOA
member.summary: Contains and receives display information for a toolbar item. This structure is used with the TBN_GETDISPINFO notification code.

member.name: NMTBDISPINFOA.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

summary.para: Set of flags that indicate which members of this structure are being requested. This can be one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: The item's image index is being requested. The image index must be placed in the iImage member.
Set this flag when processing TBN_GETDISPINFO; the toolbar control will retain the supplied information and not request it again.

member.name: NMTBDISPINFOA.idCommand
member.summary: Command identifier of the item for which display information is being requested. This member is filled in by the control before it sends the notification code.

member.name: NMTBDISPINFOA.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the item for which display information is being requested. This member is filled in by the control before sending the notification code.

member.name: NMTBDISPINFOA.pszText
member.summary: Pointer to a character buffer that receives the item's text.

member.name: NMTBDISPINFOA.cchText
member.summary: Size of thepszText buffer, in characters.
